Reviews.Title: Small Fiddly camera
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey A. Blackwood
Reviews.Content: Takes fair pictures and videos.  The camera is too fiddly.  Using one led to show 3 different modes is dumb.  Several leds  would be much easer to tell what mode the camera is in,

Reviews.Title: mini cam
Reviews.Author: fredy
Reviews.Content: do not get this product, poor quality video, hard to tell what mode you are in, no sound quality, do not waste your money.

ProductInfo.Features:
The smallest DVR camera yet! Record video covertly with this 2.5 cm² digital camcorder | Store up to 32 GB of video, requires Micro SD/TF card (not included) | Can also be used as a web cam
Rechargeable lithium-ion battery charges via any USB port | Recharge Voltage: DC-5V | Video Format: AVI | Video Code: MJPEG | Video Resolution: 480p
Picture Mode: JPG | Picture Resolution: 1280*1024 | Compatible System: Windows ME/2000/XP/2003/Vista, Mac OS 10.4, Linux | Data Transfer Interface: USB Cable
Package Contents: 1 x Mini DVR Camera, 1 x Strap, 1 x USB Cable, 1 x Instructions
HDE is a registered trademark and is the only authorized seller of HDE branded products
ProductInfo.Name: HDE Smallest Tiny Mini Digital Video Recording DVR Micro Camera
